external_references.description: Fishbein, N. (2020, September 8). Attackers Abusing Legitimate Cloud Monitoring Tools to Conduct Cyber Attacks. Retrieved September 22, 2021.
Kol, Roi. Morag, A. (2020, August 25). Deep Analysis of TeamTNT Techniques Using Container Images to Attack. Retrieved September 22, 2021.

description: [TeamTNT](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0139) has deployed privileged containers that mount the filesystem of victim machine.(Citation: Intezer TeamTNT September 2020)(Citation: Aqua TeamTNT August 2020)
